snippet.title: TonySlopes Alpha GamePlay
snippet.description:
Here is very early alpha gameplay footage of Tony Slopes. For those of you who saw and played it at EGX you will recognize the Area52 map featured here.
There is still a lot to add, like throwable and droppable objects that will cause your opponents to fall from their rides.

Follow Tony Slopes on social media...
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/OfficialTony...
Twitter:
https://www.twitter.com/TonySlopesGame
Website:
http://www.tonyslopes.com/
